title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4108.4 - Time of eligibility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4108.4 - Time of eligibility

State Regulations

Horses must be eligible when entries close, but winnings
on closing date of eligibility shall not be considered. In mixed races, trotting and pacing, a horse must be eligible under the conditions for the gait
at which it is stated in the entry the horse will perform. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4108.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
